snippet: Tampa Bay’s star center, Steven Stamkos, was wheeled off the ice with a right leg injury after crashing into a goal post against Boston in a 3-0 loss.
abstract: Tampa Bay Lightning lose to Boston Bruins, 3-0; Tampa's star center, Steven Stamkos, is wheeled off the ice with a right leg injury after crashing into a goal post .
lead_paragraph: Tampa Bay’s star center, Steven Stamkos, was wheeled off the ice with a right leg injury after crashing into a goal post against Boston in a 3-0 loss.

headline.main: Stamkos Breaks Leg in Game Against Boston
